Package edu.ntnu.idi.bidata.register

Class FoodStorage

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idi.bidata.register.FoodStorage
public class FoodStorage extends Object
This class represents a storage where instances of Grocery> can be stored. The storage can represent a fridge, drawer, freezer etc.
Since:
05.11.2024
Version:
1.0.0

  • Constructor Details

    • FoodStorage

      public FoodStorage()
      Constructor for FoodStorage. Constructor is empty, because the idea is to have an empty storage, that will be filled with instances of Grocery, with the according methods.

  • Method Details

    • addGrocery

      public void addGrocery(Grocery providedGrocery)
      Adds an instance of Grocery to the storage. If the grocery already exists with the same expiration date, it updates the quantity and price.
      Parameters:
      providedGrocery - The instance of a Grocery to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided grocery is invalid.

    • removeGrocery

      public void removeGrocery(String groceryToRemove, BigDecimal quantityToRemove)
      Removes a specified grocery from the storage.
      Parameters:
      groceryToRemove - The name of the grocery to remove.
      quantityToRemove - The quantity to remove.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the inputs are invalid.
      NoSuchElementException - if the grocery list is empty.

    • searchGrocery

      public List<Grocery> searchGrocery(String nameOfGrocery)
      Method that searches for an instance of Grocery in the storage.
      Parameters:
      nameOfGrocery - The name of the grocery to search for.
      Returns:
      List of groceries that matches the search.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input name is invalid.

    • valueOfExpiredGroceries

      public BigDecimal valueOfExpiredGroceries(List<Grocery> expiredGroceries)
      Calculates the total value of expired groceries.
      Parameters:
      expiredGroceries - The list of expired groceries.
      Returns:
      The total value of expired groceries.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - the grocery list is empty

    • listOfExpiredGroceries

      public List<Grocery> listOfExpiredGroceries(String providedExpiryDate)
      Lists the groceries that expire before the given date.
      Parameters:
      providedExpiryDate - The date to check against.
      Returns:
      List of expired groceries.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the date format is invalid.

    • valueOfAllGroceries

      public BigDecimal valueOfAllGroceries()
      Calculates the total value of all groceries in storage.
      Returns:
      The total value of all groceries.

    • getSortedList

      public List<Grocery> getSortedList()
      Get method to get a sorted list of all groceries in storage. Sorted alphabetically by name
      Returns:
      Sorted list of groceries.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the grocery list is empty.

    • isGroceryAvailable

      public boolean isGroceryAvailable(String nameOfIngredient, BigDecimal requiredQuantity, String unitOfMeasurement)
      Checks if there is enough quantity of a specified grocery.
      Parameters:
      nameOfIngredient - The name of the ingredient to check.
      requiredQuantity - The required quantity of ingredient.
      unitOfMeasurement - The unit of measurement.
      Returns:
      true if the required quantity is available, false otherwise.>
